refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: In an OrderedList, each member of the list is marked with a numeral, letter, or other sequential symbol (such as roman numerals).

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: If no value is specified for Numeration, Arabic numerals (1, 2, 3, â€¦) are to be used.
In nested lists, DocBook does not specify the sequence of numerations.
Note that the attributes of OrderedList have a significant influence on the processing expectations.
